ygData.subject: RE: Glowing Black Stone
ygData.msgSnippet: Some ways that you don t get exp: 1) Someone in your group casts DoTs then goes LD before the creature dies. Doesn t always happen. Similarly a charmed pet
ygData.messageBody:
Some ways that you don't get exp:

1) Someone in your group casts DoTs then goes LD before the creature dies.
Doesn't always happen. Similarly a charmed pet that casts a DoT then breaks
charm before the target dies could have this happen, though I've never seen
it.
2) You are too far away when the creature dies.
3) Group exp bug. There are numerous cases of individuals getting exp over
groups (still), usually unintenionally. However the exp thing is coded it
doesn't seem to be the group that does the most damage that gets the exp. It
seems more like whoever does the most damage in the round of combat the
creature dies in.
4) The thing you kill is blue or higher but gives no experience e.g.
merchant.

Mawrin

> -----Original Message-----
> From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
> Sent: 14 February 2000 16:11
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Glowing Black Stone
>
>
> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
> Well, I would say that you either killed a green mob with your
> pet or it was
> actually your pet that died. You get no experience from a charmed mob's
> death. I can't recall any times when my pet killed a blue or
> better than I
> did not get any exp from it.
>
> Chiming
> 20th Enchantress on Fennin Ro
>
> > From: "Amy Pratt" <sfpratt@...>
> >
> > Could one of you guys take the time please to explain how xp and charmed
> > critters relates?
> > I made level 12 today, and I was playing around with charm. I
> > noticed that
> > a lot of the time, I didn't get any xp when my pet's target
> died. What's
> > happening?
> >
> > Caelrie, enchanter on Fennin Ro.
>
>
